Review.Contenu: I have never had any issues so far. I purchased "Focus 4 Software," which was not what I had expected and had requested a return with a full refund. Wrote an email, no response.

On 25-11-2022 I was charged 19,39 Euros in my account for the amount of the Bundle Order VFX Bundle #987373. The instructions for downloading the package indicate that introduction of my email and the serial code that will be received after the purchase is completed. The purchase has been made and collected, and the serial code has not been sent to me. I've claimed it from InkyDeals four times and never answered my mails. It's not the first purchase I make at InkyDeals and it's always worked well, this time it's been a mess. I preside an association of over 1300 photographers and if this is not resolved I am free to make the misbehavior public in this association.AtentmentJosé Luis Cuendia “Guendy”

The product is fine, it was the customer service that was not good. I wrote 2 times saying it was not customer friendly in using the 50% code and I was not able to put the code in to get a discount. No one ever got back with me which was very disappointing.

The deal was good, plus I got numerous freebies, but …I’ve contacted support about this several times: I never got an email saying that my deal went through, even though it’s now been over a month! In fact, this review-related email is the first indication that it was finalized! When I go to my “Orders,” it STILL shows “Processing!”There’s never been a response to any of my “Contact” messages from a month ago! The only indication of anything happening at all: a few weeks ago, I discovered that my “Downloads” include what I ordered. So, nice to have them there, but it would have been nice to have been given a heads up several weeks earlier!So, the experience was frustrating, but it looks as though I still ended up with the downloads for which I’d payed.

Awesome company and customer service. I have often not realized that packages and bundles were made for apple products, or other adobe software that I don't have and InkyDeals has no problem honoring their 30-day no questions asked return policy so I can grab something that I can use. (I do wish they would make it more obvious which software  is compatible - I see a section on some pages, but not others, but putting it right up front would help people like me skip right over the incompatible products.
